title: what is the Nightbringer Yasuo Icon and Border what its help
body:
hi 

what is the Nightbringer Yasuo Icon and Border what its help 

i have the yasuo nightbringer and i get the icon border but what its help i dont understand how its work ?? for what i mean

replies.body: If you own the Nightbringer Yasuo skin and have the Border Icon as well, you should see a special loading screen border on your image whenever you play with that skin. Keep in mind you have to use Nightbringer Yasuo in order to have the border show up.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4EAmW9Gt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-18T04:18:03.358+0000)
>
> If you own the Nightbringer Yasuo skin and have the Border Icon as well, you should see a special loading screen border on your image whenever you play with that skin. Keep in mind you have to use Nightbringer Yasuo in order to have the border show up.
